ops.description: fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Barret}
“Now you're pissin' me off!!
This don't matter, so get on with it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // {Cloud}
“I was here until I was 14,
and I don't remember you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Cloud}
“…Have I been here before?
…I don't remember.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // “Nice town, huh?”{PAUSE}“We've been in business here
for a long time…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // “It's not nice to lie!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // “How can you shop at a time like this?”{PAUSE}“What? Me, in business?”{PAUSE}“Don't worry, it's all right.
I get paid by the company.”{PAUSE}“But my real job is protecting
Nibelheim's secret.”{PAUSE}“What? Secret?”{PAUSE}“We don't have a clue.
But it's all right.”{PAUSE}“It's all over anyway!”{PAUSE}“Finished, finito, over!!
Even as we speak Meteor…
This is the end!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Cloud}
“A man in a black cape!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Cloud}
“He has a tattoo of the number'12'.
Mmm? He has something.”

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“…Have I been here before?

“Now you're pissin' me off!!
This don't matter, so get on with it!”

“Nice town, huh?”{PAUSE}“We've been in business here
for a long time…”

with this town?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}How about bein' born and raised here?

and I don't remember you.”
